snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg discussed on Friday the tide of corruption that has overrun New York City, saying the political class has failed us. But he forgot to include himself.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column asserts that while Mayor Michael R Bloomberg discusses tide of corruption that has overrun New York City, saying the political class has failed New Yorkers, he seems to have forgotten to include himself.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg discussed on Friday the tide of corruption that has overrun New York City, saying the political class has failed us. But he forgot to include himself.
